vision: Central coordinator for all ITOM agents -- routes tasks, manages multi-agent workflows, enforces role boundaries, and maintains execution state across the ServiceNow ITOM automation suite

phases.name: Foundation
phases.description: Project structure, configuration, MCP server skeleton, core models, and state persistence. Establishes the foundational infrastructure all subsequent phases build upon.

milestones.name: Project scaffold and MCP server operational
milestones.description: Python package installs cleanly, MCP server starts, health endpoint responds, all core models defined, state persistence operational

phases.name: Agent Registry
phases.description: Agent registration, capability declaration, health checking, and dynamic configuration. The orchestrator learns what agents exist and what they can do.

milestones.name: Agent registry with health monitoring
milestones.description: All 6 ITOM agents registered with capabilities, health checks functional, get_agent_registry and get_agent_status MCP tools operational

phases.name: Task Routing
phases.description: Domain-based routing engine, task execution with timeout/retry, and configurable routing rules. The orchestrator can receive tasks and dispatch them to the right agent.

milestones.name: Intelligent task routing and execution
milestones.description: route_task MCP tool correctly routes tasks by domain, task execution handles timeouts and retries, routing rules configurable via JSON

phases.name: Workflow Engine
phases.description: Multi-agent workflow definitions, state machine execution engine, checkpoint/resume, and pre-built workflow templates. The orchestrator can coordinate complex multi-agent operations.

milestones.name: Multi-agent workflow execution with checkpoint/resume
milestones.description: execute_workflow runs multi-step workflows across agents, state machine enforces valid transitions, checkpoint/resume works after failures, 5 pre-built templates available

phases.name: Cross-Agent Communication
phases.description: Inter-agent message passing, event bus for lifecycle events, and agent notification/callback system. Agents can communicate through the orchestrator.

milestones.name: Full inter-agent communication stack
milestones.description: send_agent_message MCP tool delivers messages between agents, event bus broadcasts lifecycle events, notification system proactively informs agents of relevant events

phases.name: Role Enforcement
phases.description: Role boundary definitions, policy enforcement engine, audit trail, and per-agent boundary configurations. The orchestrator ensures agents only operate within their designated domains.

milestones.name: Role enforcement and audit compliance
milestones.description: enforce_role_boundaries MCP tool validates actions, all 6 agents have defined boundaries, audit log captures all actions with hash chain integrity

phases.name: Testing and Documentation
phases.description: Comprehensive unit tests, integration tests, MCP tool validation, and error handling hardening. Production-quality test coverage and robust error paths.

milestones.name: Production-quality test coverage and hardened errors
milestones.description: 90%+ code coverage, all MCP tools validated, all error paths tested, error handling hardened with clear error codes
